sources.title: Stop, Look, and Listen (1949)
sources.description: Oil Can Harry, most malevolent and evil of all the villainous cats, has pretty Pearl Pureheart, cutest mouse of them all, in his grasping clutches, and ties her to the railroad tracks. But here comes Mighty Mouse to her rescue. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/stop-look-and-listen-1949/

metadata.Plot: Oil Can Harry, most malevolent and evil of all the villainous cats, has pretty Pearl Pureheart, cutest mouse of them all, in his grasping clutches, and ties her to the railroad tracks. But here comes Mighty Mouse to her rescue.
metadata.Writer: Eddie Donnelly, John Foster, Tom Morrison
metadata.Actors: Roy Halee, Tom Morrison, Ken Schoen
